    • sendFriendRequest

      public void sendFriendRequest(int userId1, int userId2)
      The user with userId1 will send a friend request to the user with id userId2 and the friend request will pe stored in the receiver's friendRequest list
      Parameters:
      userId1 - - id of the user who send the friend request
      userId2 - - id of the user who receive the friend request

    • acceptFriendRequest

      public void acceptFriendRequest(int userId1, int userId2)
      The friend request that the user with id userId1 send to the user with id userId2 will be accepted and this two users will become friends, each of them will be stored in the other one friends list
      Parameters:
      userId1 - - id of the first user
      userId2 - - id of the second user

    • declineFriendRequest

      public void declineFriendRequest(int userId1, int userId2)
      The friend request that the user with id userId1 send to the user with id userId2 will be declined and the request will be removed from the receiver friendRequest list
      Parameters:
      userId1 - - id of the first user
      userId2 - - id of the second user

      public void removeFriend(int userId1, int userId2)

    • acceptAllFriendRequests

      public int acceptAllFriendRequests(int id) throws ServiceException
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the user for which I want to accept all friend requests
      Returns:
      - the number of friend requests that was accepted
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - if user isn t find or if there aren t friend requests

    • declineAllFriendRequests

      public int declineAllFriendRequests(int id) throws ServiceException
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the user for which I want to decline all friend requests
      Returns:
      - the number of friend requests that was declined
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - if there aren't friend requests
